participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and easy-going, enjoys relaxing at home.
participant_1.background: I like to sit on couch all day. I make cars for a living. I like to watch tv. I love mac and cheese. I make 30k a year.

participant_2.name: Sarah Johnson
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, always seeking new experiences.
participant_2.background: Just this past week I got a job cleaning gutters. I ride a motorcycle, but it’s not a Harley. My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg. I spend every waking hour I can at the archery center.

content.text: Hi, my name is [participant_1]. What's your name?
Hi, my name is [participant_2].
What do you do for a living?
I just got a job cleaning gutters this past week.
Oh, that sounds interesting. How do you like it?
It's not bad so far. It's a lot of hard work, but it's also good exercise.
That's good. What else do you like to do?
I like to ride my motorcycle.
Oh, cool! What kind of motorcycle do you have?
It's not a Harley, but it's a pretty nice bike.
That's cool. Do you like to go on long rides or just around town?
I like to go on long rides, but I also like to just cruise around town.
That's cool. I've always wanted to get a motorcycle, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough.
It's not as scary as it looks. You just have to be careful and aware of your surroundings.
I'll keep that in mind. What else do you like to do?
I love to go to the archery center. I spend every waking hour I can there.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been to an archery center before.
You should go sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's really fun.
Well, it was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a nice day.
You too.
